sentences.en: Along with the augment of bridge span, construction control became more vital and attentional.
sentences.cn: 随着桥梁跨度的增大, 施工控制问题也日益成为设计和施工中的关键而备受关注.

sentences.en: Any surplus was sold to augment their income.
sentences.cn: 所有多余的东西被售卖一空来增加他们的收入。

sentences.en: As such , a huge burden is placed on the central midfield to augment defense and attack.
sentences.cn: 因此中路的两个中场球员必须挑起比平常更多的攻防重担.

sentences.en: At first this did but augment her grief!
sentences.cn: 起初,这只增添了她的悲伤!

sentences.en: Block and tackle: Combination of pulleys with rope or cable, commonly used to augment pulling force.
sentences.cn: 滑轮和滑车组: 带绳索和缆绳的滑轮组, 通常用于增大拉力.

sentences.en: Combined with 3 D - fiducial vision - based registration , the discussed algorithm can successfully accomplish the registration of augment reality.
sentences.cn: 本算法结合视点的三色基准算法完整地实现了用于增强现实的三维注册.

sentences.en: Friends often augment their recipe collection by passing around their favorites written on cards.
sentences.cn: 朋友们经常把自己最爱的食谱写在卡片上,相互传阅,来增加自己的食谱收藏.

sentences.en: Furthermore, I will augment the sum to one million.
sentences.cn: 还有, 我要把金额扩大到一百万元.

sentences.en: Hotel workers depend on tips to augment their usually small salaries.
sentences.cn: 饭店的工作人员主要靠小费来增加他(她)们平时微薄的收入.

sentences.en: How can we hope to augment our forces when our allies are deserting us?
sentences.cn: 同盟国背信弃义,我们怎能再指望扩大我们的兵力?

sentences.en: Medical materials on internet should augment rather than alternative doctor's advice.
sentences.cn: 网上医学资料应该增加,而不是替换掉医生的建议.

sentences.en: To make greater, as in value, beauty or reputation; augment.
sentences.cn: 在价值 、 美、声望上增强; 加强.

sentences.en: While searching for a way to augment the family income, she began making dolls.
sentences.cn: 为了想法子增加家庭收入，她开始制作洋娃娃。

sentences.en: Why settle for reality when you can augment it?
sentences.cn: 当我们能增大化现实的时候,我们又为什么要满足于现实 呢 ?

sentences.en: With the augment of load ellipticity, the stress of casing inw.
sentences.cn: 载荷椭圆度越大, 套管内壁应力越大且分布不均.

sentences.en: You should browse through these and augment them with your own list of readings and photographers.
sentences.cn: 你应该浏览这些它们,并通过你自己的读物和摄影作品来扩大阅读范围.

trans.tran_en: to increase the value, amount, effectiveness etc of something

trans.tran_cn: 增加， 提高， 扩大
